generatedTitle: Mexicans Represent Largest Group of US Immigrants

extractFactDictList.question: Which country sent the largest number of legal immigrants to the United States in the year 2000?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The largest number of legal immigrants to the United States in the year 2000 came from Mexico.

extractFactDictList.question: Which group of immigrants represents the largest in the United States?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Mexicans represent the largest group of immigrants living in the United States.

extractFactDictList.question: Since when have Mexicans represented the largest group of immigrants in the United States?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This has been the case since 1980, and the Mexico-US route is the largest migration corridor in the world.

extractFactDictList.question: What percentage of all immigrants in the United States does Mexico account for?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Mexico accounts for more than 11 million, roughly 25%, of all immigrants in the United States.
